author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Equip the digi study with a few diagnostic statements

#### PR validation:

Use the code to make the first calorimetric validation  of  a hybrid pileup scenario

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing particular
title: Run3-sim163 Equip the digi study with a few diagnostic statements
